short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An app that smoothes out the steam experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An app that smoothes out the steam experience.

After getting voicemailed by a client, u can press the asterisk key on your numpad to mark the customer as voicemail and go to the next customer.
